<JD_START>
Job Title: Admissions Advisor of Culinary School

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Education, Training

Description:
To Apply for this Job Click Here

Do you have a love for the culinary arts! Do you speak foodie! We are currently interviewing for a dynamic and talented Admissions Advisor. This is a sales role. The ideal candidate will have experience making outgoing calls, handling warm leads, and achieving high conversion rates? Experience in admissions at "for-profit" schools is highly valued, while also having the capability to problem-solve while demonstrating empathy and coaching skills to support potential students through life challenges and career transitions. **Please note that this position is not a remote role**

Admission Advisor Of Culinary School Responsibilities

Engage with prospective students, conduct campus tours, and guide them on financing options.Calling out to warm leads daily (approx. 100 calls/day or close to)Develop a deep knowledge of the institute's courses and effectively communicate their value.Identify and reach out to potential students to increase the applicant pool.Utilize sales techniques to convert leads into enrolled students, meet targets, and manage CRM system effectively.Collecting payments

Admission Advisor Of Culinary School Qualifications

Proven sales experience in any field, prior school admissions experience is a PLUS!Strong track record of meeting or exceeding assigned calls per day metrics.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Proficiency in sales techniques and CRM systems.

Admission Advisor Of Culinary School Benefits

Competitive salary commensurate with experience, approx. $60K-$70KComprehensive benefits package, including subsidized health insurance, Free cooking classes, paid holidays, paid time off, discounted merchandise and more!

Join our team and be part of a collaborative work environment that values personal growth and success in culinary education. Apply today!

At Goodwin Recruiting we are committed to our core values. We take our value, Dedicated to Diversity & Inclusion, very seriously and will never discriminate against a candidate or client based on any protected classes. Our clients seek qualified candidates, and that is what we deliver. A person's age, gender, race, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status, or arrest or conviction record has no bearing on whether he, she, or they are able to do the job. We evaluate the knowledge, skills, and abilities that meet the requirements of the position and aim to open doors and change lives. We value all people, understanding that uniqueness and diversity foster a stronger team that is innovative and brings varying perspectives to the table. We put our money where our mouth is and are proud of our efforts to identify a broad slate of candidates, with many hiring success stories to share. JOB ID: 134912 #post

Shanna Stevenson

To Apply for this Job Click Here

, $75,000 - $85,000,

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
